Name: Fighting Style
Description: Choose a fighting style that modifies the way the fighter can attack and defend.

Name: Second Wind
Description: Can use a bonus action to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + fighter level.

Name: Action Surge
Description: Can take an additional action on their turn.

Name: Martial Archetype
Description: Chooses a archetype that grants additional abilities and options.

Name: Ability Score Improvement
Description: Can increase one ability score by 2 or two ability scores by 1.

Name: Extra Attack
Description: Can attack twice, instead of once, whenever they take the Attack action on their turn.

Name: Indomitable
Description: Can reroll a failed saving throw, but must use the new roll.

Name: Relentless
Description: Can regain use of Second Wind while at 0 hit points, but must finish a short or long rest before doing so again.
